RabadonsDeathcap_desc: <tftitemrules>This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.</tftitemrules>
9Chempunk_BloodRageMod_desc:
Mod: Gain 25% Attack Speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 Health, increase the Attack Speed bonus by 100% and heal for 35% maximum Health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the Attack Speed bonus by 400% and heal for 100% maximum Health.
9Chempunk_VirulentBiowareMod_desc:
Mod: Release a virulent plague whenever you deal Ability damage, causing enemies within 1 hex of the target to take 25% more damage for 4 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration is 10 seconds and plague deals 5% maximum Health magic damage per second.
9Chempunk_UnstableChemtankMod_desc:
Mod: Gain 33% maximum Health and explode on death, dealing 30% of your maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Overcharge: Explosion deals 45% of your maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 3 hexes instead.
9Chempunk_RoboticArmMod_desc:
Mod: Attacks have a 33% chance to trigger 1 additional attack.

Overcharge: Attacks deal 40% Attack Damage as bonus true damage.
9Chempunk_ChemtankMod_desc:
Mod: Gain 33 Armor and Magic Resistance. Every 5 seconds, cleanse all negative effects and heal for 10% maximum Health.

Overcharge: Each time the holder heals, deal 150% of the heal amount as magic damage to adjacent enemies.
9Chempunk_AdaptiveImplantMod_desc:
Mod: While above 50% Health, gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below, gain 25% Omnivamp.

Overcharge: Always gain both effects, and their power is increased by 100%.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt
InfinityEdge_desc: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.
5TrapClawRadiant_desc: After damaging a shielded enemy, Abilities and attacks deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>70%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> more damage for 3 seconds.
5IonicSparkRadiant_desc:
50% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to 250% of their maximum Mana.

Also, regenerate 1% maximum Health per second.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
5QuicksilverRadiant_desc:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
5HextechGunbladeRadiant_desc: Grant 35% Omnivamp. Damage dealt heals the lowest percent Health ally for the same amount.
5StatikkShivRadiant_desc:
Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 65 magic damage and 50% Shredding them for 5 seconds.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist
5FrozenHeartRadiant_desc: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain %i:scaleArmor% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>70</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Armor and %i:scaleMR% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>70</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Magic Resist for the rest of combat, and a <TFTRadiantItemBonus>50%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> maximum Health shield that lasts up to 10 seconds.
5BlueBuffRadiant_desc:
Abilities cost %i:scaleMana% 10 less Mana to cast.

If the holder gets at least 1 takedown within 3 seconds of casting, gain %i:scaleMana% 20 Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
5ArchangelsStaffRadiant_desc: Combat start: Gain %i:scaleAP% <TFTRadiantItemBonus>30</TFTRadiantItemBonus> Ability Power every <TFTRadiantItemBonus>4</TFTRadiantItemBonus> seconds.
5MorellonomiconRadiant_desc:
Magic or true damage from the holder's Ability 60% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

Wound: reduces healing received
5BrambleVestRadiant_desc:
Negates all bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 125/175/225 %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 1.5 seconds).

[Direct damage item]

Combat start: A Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage arises and Taunts nearby enemies.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

Combat start: Shoot a wider beam that 50% Mana Reaves enemies.
Your team gains %i:scaleMana% 15 starting Mana.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Mana Reave: increase maximum Mana until the next cast

Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage.

​​[Direct damage item]

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]
